problem.markdown: >>What is the typical fee for a recruiter/corporate headhunter?<< ( ) $100-$2000 (x) $1000-$20,000 {{ About 1-2 months salary. If a student is connected to a job once, we end up with perhaps 10% of tuition. We need about 10x the students of a normal school to cover tuition. }} ( ) $20,000-$100,000
problem.p: What is the typical fee for a recruiter/corporate headhunter?

choicegroup.label: What is the typical fee for a recruiter/corporate headhunter?
choicegroup.choice: $1000-$20,000 About 1-2 months salary. If a student is connected to a job once, we end up with perhaps 10% of tuition. We need about 10x the students of a normal school to cover tuition.
